text:
Hi everyone,

Are there any updates with CMS React?

The <https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/release-log.html#_2024-11-15|release log> is stuck on November 15 2024, I was hoping to see more in regards of the <Module> and <Partial> components as well as the new theming.
I have to develop a new website for a customer and I draw a lot of confidence from regular updates / communication :slightly_smiling_face:

Thank you!

Hi everyone
Is there any way to use i18n-react with cms-react in SSR?
Seems like this would be fairly simple to publish to Github.
are path aliases still a no?
